content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll create a new report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing System (around x=41-46, y=-80)
A coal processing setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal, facing DOWN
- Transport belt system from (41.5, -80.5) to (43.5, -80.5), all facing RIGHT, containing 12 coal
- Burner inserter at (44.5, -80.5) facing RIGHT, picking up from (43.5, -80.5) and dropping at (45.5, -80.5)
- Stone furnace at (46.0, -80.0) facing UP

Current operational status:
- Mining drill: Waiting for space in destination
- Belt system: Working, transporting coal
- Inserter: Waiting for space in destination
- Furnace: No ingredients, fuel source full (50 coal)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement and Alignment Issues
- When placing entities that interact (like inserters and furnaces), ensure their input/output positions align perfectly
- Pay attention to the exact drop positions of inserters when placing target entities
- Consider the size of entities (furnaces are 2x2, inserters 1x1) when planning layouts

### Inventory Management
- Clear blocked transport belts to allow continuous operation
- Monitor and manage furnace fuel levels to prevent overfilling

### Code-Related Errors
- When accessing entity dimensions (width/height), ensure proper attribute access methods are used instead of direct arithmetic operations with ModelPrivateAttr

NAMESPACE

Functions:
None defined in the provided logs

Important Variables:
- Mining drill status: EntityStatus (enum)
- Belt system status: EntityStatus (enum)
- Furnace status: EntityStatus (enum)
- Inserter status: EntityStatus (enum)
- Entity positions: Position(x: float, y: float)
- Entity directions: Direction (enum)
- Inventory contents: Dict[str, int]
